text: My 4 year old daughter has been with the centre for the past 2 months and she really likes the lessons! She is also able to grasp new math concepts at her own pace and in a fun manner. Highly recommended for all parents wanting to ease your kid into learning maths!
Sent my daughter to their math class for about a month and I noticed she has improved a lot. I'm happy to see that she is more interested about math too. Definitely recommend this tuition centre
